boardgame.name: Thunderbirds
boardgame.description: The co-operative game Thunderbirds, released in 2015 to celebrate the 50th anniversary of the cult hit TV show, features the iconic Thunderbirds machines and a high-octane world full of disasters and victims for players to rescue._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Set in the year 2065, Thunderbirds follows the exploits of International Rescue, a secret organization committed to saving human life, secretly founded and funded by the millionaire Tracy family, with the motto: _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;lsquo;Never give in, at any cost!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo; International Rescue has a host of technologically advanced land-, sea-, air-, and space-rescue vehicles and equipment ready to launch at a moment_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s notice._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Racing to the rescue from a secret island base beneath the luxurious home of the Tracy family somewhere in the South Pacific Ocean, International Rescue defies government spies and criminals who want the secrets of their incredible machines for their own. To combat this threat, Lady Penelope, the Thunderbirds_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo; aristocratic English secret agent, and her chauffeur Parker lead a network of agents to uncover those behind the disasters caused by deliberate sabotage._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;A criminal mastermind known as _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ldquo;The Hood_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rdquo;, operating from a temple deep in the Malaysian jungle and in possession of strange powers, often engineers events to allow him to spy on the Thunderbird machines with the goal of selling their secrets to the highest bidder._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The iconic Thunderbirds are designed by the Tracy family_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s close friend _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ldquo;Brains_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rdquo; and are assigned to each of the five Tracy brothers:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;- Thunderbird 1, piloted by Scott Tracy _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; a hypersonic rocket plane used for fast response and rescue-zone reconnaissance, and as a mobile control base._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;- Thunderbird 2, piloted by Virgil Tracy _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; a supersonic VTOL carrier which transports their major rescue equipment in detachable pods._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;- Thunderbird 3, piloted by Alan Tracy _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; a single-stage, vertically launched spacecraft_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;- Thunderbird 4, piloted by Gordon Tracy _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; a utility submersible for underwater rescue, launched from Thunderbird 2_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;- Thunderbird 5, manned by John Tracy _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; a space station in geo-stationary orbit that monitors calls for help from across Earth._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Finally, Lady Penelope has the iconic FAB 1, driven by Parker _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; a pink, amphibious car._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Thunderbirds is a cult 1960s British science-fiction television series, created by Gerry and Sylvia Anderson. It was produced using a combination of marionette puppetry and scale-model special effects, which was dubbed _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ldquo;Supermarionation_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rdquo;. Two series, totaling thirty-two 50-minute episodes, were produced, along with two films using the same techniques._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Players will work together using Thunderbirds characters and vehicles to complete rescue missions and save the day._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

During Kickstarter backers could chose the KS art or the retail art. The equivalent package can be purchased for 89.99 GBP from Modiphius: https://www.modiphius.net/collections/thunderbirds/products/thunderbirds-board-game-all-three-expansions Item can be shipped to Switzerland (from within Switzerland) or to any other European country. In the latter case I´d be able to ship the game from Germany, as this would save quite a lot on shipping costs and time (+ potentially on customs). Shipping weight incl. packaging is approx. 2.5kg.

100% Complete. Mint condition. Includes the expansions: The Hood Above and Beyond Tracy Island and the Devious Schemes promotional cards.

The theme needs no introduction – for anyone brought up in Britain, anyway. This is a co-operative game with the players taking the roles of the five Tracy brothers (and Lady Penelope) as International Rescue races to save lives and thwart the evil Hood. Brilliant! Brilliant! Brilliant!
The price shown is for UK/EU purchasers (and includes VAT). Or make me an offer. For purchasers outside the EU, the price is £16.67 (net of UK tax) - note that the purchaser is responsible for paying any duty or tax due on import to their country. I charge shipping at cost, as follows. UK addresses: £3.09 (myHermes, takes 3 working days, tracked) Other EU countries: £13.32 (Air mail, takes 1 week or so, not tracked) Europe outside the EU: £11.10 (Air mail, takes 1 week or so, not tracked) Australasia: £17.75 (Air mail, takes 1 week or so, not tracked) USA, Canada _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; elsewhere: £16.50 (Air mail, takes 1 week or so, not tracked)
